GeneDef.label: very slow mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extreme issues making their mechs work faster, resulting in mech speed boosts having no impact.\n\nThis only takes effect if the mechanitor is under the effects of something that adds speed, like a precept or an implant. This is technically free met if you plan on never using something that would enhance mech work speeds.

GeneDef.label: slow mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues making their mechs work faster, resulting in mech speed boosts having half impact.\n\nThis only takes effect if the mechanitor is under the effects of something that adds speed, like a precept or an implant. This is technically free met if you plan on never using something that would enhance mech work speeds.

GeneDef.label: somewhat fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have slightly improved mech work speed, at the cost of their own ability to work quickly.

GeneDef.label: fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have improved mech work speed, at the cost of their own ability to work quickly.

GeneDef.label: very fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have significantly improved mech work speed, at the cost of their own ability to work quickly.

GeneDef.label: extremely fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extremely improved mech work speed, at the cost of their own ability to work quickly.

GeneDef.label: super fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have super improved mech work speed, at the cost of their own ability to work quickly.

GeneDef.label: hyper fast mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can make their mechs work unbelievably quickly.
